General.Name: Ruby Tech
General.Description: Ruby Tech Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of networking products in Taiwan. The company offers power over ethernet (PoE), speed, grade, unmanaged, fiber, industrial PoE, and white box switches; network video recorder PoE switches; converters; fiber network interface cards; and Ethernet ring protection switching solutions. Ruby Tech Corporation was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
